button_showEnabledLinks.description: Shown in popup below some errors to allow users to see enabled links.
button_showEnabledLinks.message: Show enabled links using additional parameters

button_showOtherEnabledLinks.description: Shown in popup below the list of links; to see other enabled links with additional parameters.
button_showOtherEnabledLinks.message: Show the rest of the enabled links using additional parameters

config_deleteButton.description: Text inside 'delete button' in configuration page

config_editButton.description: Text inside 'edit button' in configuration page

config_linkDeleted.description: Shown inline when a link is deleted inside configuration page
config_linkDeleted.message: Link $LINK_NAME$ deleted. Click here to undo.

config_saveButton.description: Text inside 'save button' in configuration page

configurationLink.description: Link to configuration page inside main popup.

error_incompatibleWebsite.description: Error shown inside popup when appropriate
error_incompatibleWebsite.message:
No map or OpenStreetMap parameters were found.
If this is unexpected, you can report it in $EXTENSION_SITE$.

error_noAccess.description: Error shown inside popup when the current page cannot be accessed (technical exception)
error_noAccess.message:
ERROR: Could not find or access current page.
If this page is still loading, try again.
If this is unexpected, please report it in $EXTENSION_SITE$.

error_noInformationExtracted.description: Error shown inside popup when appropriate
error_noInformationExtracted.message:
The website was recognized, but no parameters were found.
If this is a map, try to move it a little to initialize it's parameters.
If this looks like a bug, please report it in $EXTENSION_SITE$.

extensionDescription.message: Helps OpenStreetMap contributors to easily switch between different maps and analysis tools from the community.

extensionStoreDescription.description: Description shown in Chrome and Firefox's extension download page
extensionStoreDescription.message:
When you click the menu's button, this extension will detect OpenStreetMap parameters inside the current page and will generate a list of related maps and tools with these parameters. Recognized parameters include:
  • Map coordinates (zoom, latitude and longitude)
  • OSM elements (node id, way id, relation id and changeset id)
  • User names and GPS traces id
If you are not sure which website will be recognized, try going to https://www.openstreetmap.org/ before clicking on the menu. The OpenStreetMap logo is a trademark of the OpenStreetMap Foundation, and is used with their permission. This project is not endorsed by or affiliated with the OpenStreetMap Foundation.

loading.description: Shown in popup shortly before menu appears.
loading.message:
Loading...
If this does not stop loading, reload the page and try again.

newOptionDetected_added.description: Shown in popup when an unknown website seems compatible with OpenStreetMap. After the button is clicked.

newOptionDetected_buttonText.description: Shown in popup (inside the button) when an unknown website seems compatible with OpenStreetMap

newOptionDetected_notice.description: Shown in popup (before the button) when an unknown website seems compatible with OpenStreetMap
newOptionDetected_notice.message: Would you like to add this website in the menu?

noEnabledCompatibleLinksFound.description: Shown in popup when there aren't any enabled links that support the parameters found in the current page.
noEnabledCompatibleLinksFound.message: None of the enabled links are compatible with the parameters found in this page.

site_howdidyoucontribute.message: How did you contribute to OSM?
